segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, reaching up for a cookie like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to notice how dangerous this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is about to topple off that stool, and she’s just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even realizes how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is drying dishes like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone is while the kitchen is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m the only one who sees the chaos unfolding here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is so surreal and frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know how they can all be so relaxed right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
